description: Explore my portfolio, where I share my creative journey as an artist and screenwriter. Discover original works and projects that blend storytelling and visual art.
about_text: Born in Ubajara, Ceará, she is a freelance illustrator and screenwriter. She studied Screenwriting I, II, and III for Comics at Inko - School of Creative Media, with works published in the Inko collections, Canteiro de Obras (2024), Favela do Futuro (2024), and Carnaval de Rua, scheduled to be published in 2026. She participated in the comic book Café Espacial com Leite 01 with the comic strip “Almerinda e o Segredo do Jardim” (Almerinda and the Secret of the Garden).
